body_text: Why do ninjas run with their hands at the back? Ninjas in Naruto run with their hands at the back (which is very different from normal anime character running). Why is that? Is it because of their too much running speed or the wind force that their arms tend to be at their backs? Don't they lose balance when they run like that? Is there any explanation for this?
